import React from 'react'; import { Form, FormInput, FormGroup, Button, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Progress } from "shards-react"; import { Table, Pagination, Row, Col, Divider, } from 'antd' import { getMatchSearch, getMatch } from '../fetcher' import MenuBar from '../components/MenuBar'; const { Column, ColumnGroup } = Table; class MatchesPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { awayQuery: "", homeQuery: "", matchesResults: [], selectedMatchId: window.location.search ? window.location.search.substring(1).split('=')[1] : 0, selectedMatchDetails: null } this.handleAwayQueryChange = this.handleAwayQueryChange.bind(this) this.handleHomeQueryChange = this.handleHomeQueryChange.bind(this) this.updateSearchResults = this.updateSearchResults.bind(this) this.goToMatch = this.goToMatch.bind(this) } handleAwayQueryChange(event) { this.setState({ awayQuery: event.target.value }) } handleHomeQueryChange(event) { this.setState({ homeQuery: event.target.value }) } goToMatch(matchId) { window.location = `/matches?id=${matchId}` } updateSearchResults() { getMatchSearch(this.state.homeQuery, this.state.awayQuery, null, null).then(res => { this.setState({ matchesResults: res.results }) }) } componentDidMount() { getMatchSearch(this.state.homeQuery, this.state.awayQuery, null, null).then(res => { this.setState({ matchesResults: res.results }) }) getMatch(this.state.selectedMatchId).then(res => { this.setState({ selectedMatchDetails: res.results[0] }) }) } render() { return (
{ return { onClick: event => {this.goToMatch(record.MatchId)}, // clicking a row takes the user to a detailed view of the match in the /matches page using the MatchId parameter }; }} dataSource={this.state.matchesResults} pagination={{ pageSizeOptions:[5, 10], defaultPageSize: 5, showQuickJumper:true }}> a.Home.localeCompare(b.Home)}/> a.Away.localeCompare(b.Away)}/> Number(a.HomeGoals)-Number(b.HomeGoals)}/> Number(a.AwayGoals)-Number(b.AwayGoals)}/>
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails ?
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.Home} {this.state.selectedMatchDetails.Date} at {this.state.selectedMatchDetails.Time} {this.state.selectedMatchDetails.Away}

{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.HomeGoals}

Goals

{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.AwayGoals}
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.HTHomeGoals}
Half Time Goals
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.HTAwayGoals}
 {this.state.selectedMatchDetails.ShotsOnTargetHome} / {this.state.selectedMatchDetails.ShotsHome} Shot Accuracy {this.state.selectedMatchDetails.ShotsOnTargetAway} / {this.state.selectedMatchDetails.ShotsAway}
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.CornersHome}
Corners
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.CornersAway}
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.FoulsHome}
Fouls
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.FoulsAway}
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.RCHome}
Red Cards
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.RCAway}
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.YCHome}
Yellow Cards
{this.state.selectedMatchDetails.YCAway}
: null}
) } } export default MatchesPage
